All functions

CV.Zresidual()
A title
CV.Zresidual.coxph()
CV Zresidual for shared fraitly model using coxph function
CV.Zresidual.coxph.frailty()
CV Zresidual for shared fraitly model using coxph function
CV.Zresidual.survreg()
CV Zresidual for shared fraitly model using coxph function
Zresidual()
A title
Zresidual.bernoulli()
A function to calculate z-residuals of a 'brm' fit. This function is to be used when the user needs to calculate the z-residuals of bernoulli
Zresidual.coxph()
A title
Zresidual.coxph.frailty()
A title
Zresidual.hurdle.negbinomial()
A function to calculate z-residuals of a 'brm' fit. This function is to be used when the user needs to calculate the Z-residuals of TNB/HNB
Zresidual.hurdle.poisson()
A function to calculate z-residuals of a 'brm' fit. This function is to be used when the user needs to calculate the Z-residuals of TP/HP
Zresidual.negbinomial()
A function to calculate z-residuals of a 'brm' fit. This function is to be used when the user needs to calculate the Z-residuals of TNB/HNB
Zresidual.poisson()
A function to calculate z-residuals of a 'brm' fit. This function is to be used when the user needs to calculate the Z-residuals of TNB/HNB
Zresidual.survreg()
Calculate Z-residuals for a fitted survival regression model
aov.test.zresid()
A function to calculate ANOVA of Zresidual
bartlett.test(<zresid>)
A function to calculate Bartlett of Zresidual
boxplot(<zresid>)
A function to draw box plot of a z-residual
cdf.tnb()
A function to calculate cdf of Truncated Negative Binomial
cdf.tp()
A function to calculate cdf of Truncated Poisson
dhurdle.nb()
A function to calculate pdf of hurdle negative binomial.
dhurdle.pois()
A function to calculate pdf of hurdle poisson.
gof.censored.zresidual()
A function to perform a goodness-of-fit test on censored Z-residuals.
iscv_logrpp()
A function to calculate important sampling cross validation log rpp
log(<pred.dist.HNB>)
A function to calculate predictive log hurdle negative binomial pmf and cdf of a 'brm' fit
log(<pred.dist.HP>)
A function to calculate predictive log hurdle poisson pmf and cdf of 'brm' fit.
log(<pred.dist.NB>)
A function to calculate predictive log negative binomial pmf and cdf of 'brm' fit.
log(<pred.dist.TNB>)
A function to calculate predictive log truncated negative binomial pmf and cdf of 'brm' fit.
log(<pred.dist.TP>)
A function to calculate predictive log truncated poisson pmf and cdf of 'brm' fit.
log(<pred.dist.bern>)
A function to calculate log predictive distribution (pmf and cdf) of logistic component of a 'brm' fit
log(<pred.dist.pois>)
A function to calculate predictive log poisson pmf and cdf of 'brm' fit.
log(<pred.dist.zero>)
A function to calculate log predictive distribution (pmf and cdf) of logistic component of a 'brm' fit
log_diff_exp()
A function to compute the logarithm of the difference between the exponentials of two log values.
pdf(<tnb>)
A function to calculate pdf of Truncated Negative Binomial
pdf(<tp>)
A function to calculate pmf of Truncated Poisson
phurdle.nb()
A function to calculate predictive probability of hurdle negative binomial.
phurdle.pois()
A function to calculate predictive probability of hurdle poisson.
plot(<cs.residual>)
A function to draw scatter plot of a Cox-snell Residual
plot(<dev.resid>)
A function to draw scatter plot of a Deviance Residual
plot(<martg.resid>)
A function to draw scatter plot of a Martingale Residual
plot(<zresid>)
A function to draw scatter plot of a Z-residual
post_logrpp()
A function to calculate posterior log rpp
posterior.pred()
A function to calculate posterior parameter estimates
pvalue.min()
A function to calculate the min p-value
qqnorm(<zresid>)
A function to draw qq plot of a z-residual
residuals()
A function to calculate other type of residual
sf.test.zresid()
A function to calculate Shapiro-Francia test of Zresidual
sw.test.zresid()
A function to calculate Shapiro Wilk test of Zresidual
test.nl.aov()
A function to calculate ANOVA
test.var.bartl()
A function to calculate Bartlett test of Zresidual
